menu.name: Main
menu.play: This call is to confirm your appointment with the clinic at ${contact.x}. Please press 1 to confirm your appointment, press 2 to cancel this appointment and reschedule, or 3 to cancel the appointment and reschedule at a later time.

keypress.name: Transfer
keypress.play: Please hold while you are transferred to the clinic to reschedule this appointment

keypress.name: cancel
keypress.play: Your appointment has been cancelled. Please call the clinic to reschedule.

menu.name: confirm2
menu.play: Thank you for confirming this appointment, you may hang up now, press 1 to repeat the appointment time or press 2 to have this appointment sent to you as a text message.

keypress.name: repeat
keypress.play: Your appointment is confirmed for ${contact.x}. Thank you.

menu.name: SMS
menu.play: We can send the appointment to the number we just called, or to another number. To send the text to this number, press 1. To enter a different number, press 2.

menu.name: newSMS
menu.play: Enter the 10 digit number you want us to text, and press pound when finished.
Is this correct? Press 1 for yes. Press any other key to enter a new number.

keypress.play: Cool beans. A text is being sent now.
